title: Candles and Beauty faves with Hotel Lobby Candle Founder, Lindsay Silberman
itunes:title: Candles and Beauty faves with Hotel Lobby Candle Founder, Lindsay Silberman
description:
It’s time for our first guest of 2022! This week we’re speaking with Lindsay Silberman, blogger, and founder of Hotel Lobby Candle. 

 

We talk about her career path, when she got into blogging, how she started Hotel Lobby Candle, what it takes to even create a scent, her favorite travel destinations, and more! 

 

We also talk about reading nonfiction in the morning and dealing with injuries.

 

You can find Lindsay at @lindsaysilb on Instagram, lindsaysilberman.com, and check out Hotel Lobby Candles at hotellobbycandle.com

 

Lindsay’s Desert Island Beauty Picks 

Bumble and Bumble Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Heat & UV Protective Primer

Batiste Dry Shampoo

Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm

Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

Gucci Poudre De Beauté Éclat Soleil Bronzing Powder

 

What is on Lindsay’s Nightstand

Hotel Lobby Paris Nuit Candle

TriPollar STOP Vx

 

Obsessions 

Becca - Olive and June Super Glossy Top Coat

Grace - American Crime Story - Impeachment

 

Instagram Obsessions

Becca - @getyourbookoninsta

 

What we read this week!

Grace:

The Maid by Nita Prose

Good Rich People by Eliza Jane Brazier

 

Becca:

Olga Dies Dreaming by Xochitl Gonzalez

Funny You Should Ask by Elissa Susman (out 4/12)

On A Night Like This by Lindsey Kelk

I Came All This Way to Meet You: Writing Myself Home by Jami Attenberg

 

February Book Club Pick: Greenwich Park by Katharine Faulkner

 

Sponsors:

Truebill - go to Truebill.com/bop to cancel unwanted subscriptions!

Honeylove - Get 20% off a second item at honeylove.com, plus an additional 10% off when you use the code BOP.

 

Join our Facebook group for amazing book recs & more!

 

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. Visit Grace’s blog, The Stripe. New posts daily!

 

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
